property.name: data.name
property.description: This is the type of data being ingested.

property.name: atom.table.name
property.description: Name of table to store the Atom entries

property.name: atom.configured.types
property.description: Types of data from which to create Atom entries

property.name: atom.category.field.names
property.description: Field names from with to create Atom categories

property.name: atom.category.field.names.aliases
property.description: Atom category name aliases. For example, instead of using PROCESSING_DATE, use MY_PROCESSING_DATE. Place in order listed from the atom.category.field.names field above

property.name: atom.category.field.value.sub
property.description: combine the field:value into a category

property.name: atom.category.field.value.overrides
property.description: Values to use instead of the actual field value.

property.name: atom.table.ageoff.ms
property.description: Amount of time to keep the Atom entries (5 days)
